channel.title: myjavatools.com
channel.description: XML library is a simplified XML trinity, reader/writer/container. You may never need more.

item.description: Lib package, version 1.3.1. Objects, Strings, Files, Tools classes.
item.title: Myjavatools Lib ver 1.3.1
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Lib package, version 1.4.2. Objects, Strings, Files, Web, ZipInput, Tools classes.
item.title: Myjavatools Lib ver 1.4.2
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Web project, two classes to POST and receive multipart HTTP request, including file uploads.
item.title: Myjavatools Web package
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Java application that runs code from a URL.
item.title: Myjavatools Run
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Jsp-based command-line text processor.
item.title: Jsp Macro
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: When dealing with XML, you need a convenient representation of the XML data in memory. This article offers Java programmers a solution to achieve this goal: an easy-to-use package for handling XML data in Java.
item.title: Practical XML
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: RSS Java class, parses version 0.91, 0.92, 1.0, 2.0, outputs 2.0
item.title: Myjavatools RSS Class
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Fixed bug in indexOf(charSequence, CharSequence, int) - vielen dank to Gandulf Kohlweiss, Austria
item.title: Bugfix in lib/Strings, ver.1.4.2
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Added union(Set,Set) and cat(List,List) to Objects.java
item.title: Bugfix in lib/Strings, ver.1.4.2
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Rss can read all RSS versions now
item.title: Versions 0.93 and 0.94 added to RSS reader
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: web.jar: ClientHttpRequest now handles cookies, thanks to Alexei Trebounskikh's contribution
item.title: ClientHttpRequest updated to handle cookies
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: BasicXmlData copy constructor now does deep copy
item.title: BasicXmlData bug fixed, thanks to Asher Szmulevicz
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: 1. addItem did not work - fixed; 2. setters did not work - fixed; 3. Static DEFAULT_RSS was being abused by copy constructor - fixed
item.title: Rss bugs fixed, thanks to Asher Szmulevicz
item.author: Vlad Patryshev, Asher Szmulevicz

item.description: JBoss remote deployment failed on certain combinations of JBoss 3.2 and Tomcat 5 - the bypass for Tomcat bug introduced; it is faster too.
item.title: JBoss remote deployment - bypasses Tomcat bug
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: The order of data in XML is preserved; new methods added for retrieving data in the order they were read
item.title: mjxml - elements are ordered now
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: ServerHttpRequest, the class that handles multipart request in a JSP or a servlet: improved performance and robustness, to work around a bug in Tomcat 5.0
item.title: ServerHttpRequest Improved
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Fixed a bug ServerHttpRequest. If a parameter ends with carriage return, the next request parameter was being skipped.
item.title: ServerHttpRequest: bug fixed
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Updated xml.lib to work with a typical slashdot.com version of RSS version 1.0; RSS preserves xmlns attributes.
item.title: Fixed to accept slashdot.com version of RSS
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Started cuecards project (Design Patterns is the first)
item.title: Design Patterns Cue Card
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Java Trivia Cue Card added (scope, threads and locks)
item.title: Java Trivia Cue Card
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Refactoring Cue Card added
item.title: Refactoring Cue Card
item.author: Vlad Patryshev

item.description: Lib Foundations, version 5, just uploaded.
item.title: myjavatools Foundation Flasses with Generics
item.author: Vlad Patryshev
